definition.text: Binance Exchange, Spot market is fully tested for data mining and trading. Margin account trading under review & testing phase and prioritized on users requirement.

paragraphs.text: 1-min OHLCVs Capability: Yes. The ability to fetch historic data for backtesting purposes has been verified.
Trading Capability: Yes. The ability to run strategies in live-trading mode has been verified.
Comments: Fully tested. Starting with Binance is recommended as the experience is seamless. Sandbox/testnet facility available but not yet reviewed as it requires independent exchange API keys.

In order to be exchange friendly a utility has been provided to pre-download symbol ticker data, thus saving time & net download bandwidth usage. Please refer to the documentations provided.
	https://github.com/PLuv/Exchange-Raw-Data-Superalgos
